name: No Heroes Allowed: No Puzzles Either!
name_original: No Heroes Allowed: No Puzzles Either!
description:
HEROES… WELCOME TO YOUR DOOM
Save dastardly villain Badman from an army of brave heroes in this free-to-play puzzler.

As the all-powerful God of Destruction, you must quickly move falling tiles to match three or more identical icons – which will then summon a pack of deadly monsters hungry for juicy hero flesh.

For each second that passes, the heroes take one step closer to finding your master. Can you take them out in time?

• You will be granted eight pickaxes when you download this game and each puzzle you play will use up one pickaxe. Once you have used up your pickaxes, you will be given three more pickaxes to use each day – each one will take eight hours to recharge after use.
